mapper.sql: a.pid AS "pid", a.pname AS "pname", a.pcode AS "pcode", a.pdesc AS "pdesc", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_product a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.pname LIKE '%'||#{pname}||'%' '%'+#{pname}+'%' concat('%',#{pname},'%')
AND a.pcode LIKE '%'||#{pcode}||'%' '%'+#{pcode}+'%' concat('%',#{pcode},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_product( pname, pcode, pdesc, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{pname}, #{pcode}, #{pdesc}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_product SET pname = #{pname}, pcode = #{pcode}, pdesc = #{pdesc}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE pid = #{id}
